meta_description: Rochester Art Center offers everyone the opportunity to appreciate the arts through exhibitions and programs that encourage questioning and creativity. We are located along the river with the Mayo Civic Center at 2nd St. SE and are connected to the extensive trail and skyway systems.
admission_text:
## Membership

As a Member, you receive free admission to experience some of the most exciting and provocative contemporary art in the world. You can also feed your mind and soul with invitations to our innovative public programs and members-only events. Become a part of a vibrant community of contemporary art lovers!

## Choose your Membership Level

Contributor

Access for one | $40 FREE Admission to all Art Center exhibitions Invitation to members-only events. Discounts on ticketed workshops and events. E-Newsletter subscription.

Supporter

Access for two | $65 All the benefits from Contributor membership + Free admission to the History Center of Olmsted County (Members of the History Center of Olmsted County enjoy free admission to Rochester Art Center. Programs, workshops and events are not included.)

Explorer

$100 All the benefits of Supporter membership + Discounted summer camp tuition for Total Arts Day Camp. Free admission to the Minnesota Marine Art Museum in Winona, MN. Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums [Free admission to 180+ participating museums]

Promoter

$250 - $499 All the benefits of Explorer membership + North American Reciprocal Membership (NARM) and Modern & Contemporary Reciprocal Membership (ModCo)

Partner

$500 - $999 All the benefits of Promoter membership + Private tour with RAC staff Invitations to select VIP receptions with artists, curators and Executive Director.

Innovator

$1000 - $2,499 All the benefits of Partner membership +...
collections_text:
## Current & Upcoming Exhibitions

[](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/hard-copy)

Hard Copy

November 29, 2025 - August 2, 2026

Rochester Art Center presents "Hard Copy," a solo exhibition by multidisciplinary artist Erin Smith. For the past few years, Smithâ€™s practice has largely existed at the intersection of digital and physical media, a space she explores mainly through the lens of ceramics.

[Learn More ](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/hard-copy)

[](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/face-in-clouds-invisible-ink)

Face in Clouds, invisible ink

September 13, 2025 - April 2026

Face in Clouds, invisible ink is a solo exhibition by NYC-based artist Ryan Woodring. The exhibition encompasses several recent bodies of work that proceed both literally and figuratively out of a reckoning with invisible illness.

[Learn More ](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/face-in-clouds-invisible-ink)

[](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/cyclone)

Cyclone: Artist Responses to 100 Years of the History Center of Olmsted County Collection

October 26, 2025 - Sunday, March 29 2026

Rochester Art Center is proud to present Cyclone: Artist Responses to 100 Years of the History Center of Olmsted County Collection, a major exhibition that bridges past and present through art, history, and community storytelling.

[Learn More ](https://www.rochesterartcenter.org/exhibition/cyclone)
